problems.description: Sounds familiar? Your team shares variables on Slack, nobody knows the latest version, and bugs appear because every developer has different configurations.

dashboard.title: Centralized Dashboard
dashboard.description: Manage projects and variables from a clean interface. Define environments, assign permissions, and keep everything organized.
